forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 64. West wind 6 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As night envelops Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a gentle coolness, settling in around 48 degrees. The city skyline, partially hidden by a shroud of clouds, reflects a serene beauty, with hints of the Golden Gate Bridge peeking through the residual haze. The west wind whispers softly, stirring the leaves and slightly lifting the edges of jackets donned by evening strollers.

Tomorrow promises a bright transformation. A sunny day awaits, with temperatures nudging upwards to a pleasant 64 degrees. As the sun rises, it is expected to bathe the city in warm light, vanquishing any lingering fog that cradles the hills and softly drapes over the bay waters. The winds will be gentle — just enough to carry the scent of the ocean inland. To embrace this splendid day, light layers will serve best; a comfortable cardigan or a light jacket tossed over a casual shirt should suffice, allowing for a comfortable experience whether you stroll through a park or sip coffee at an outdoor café. 

This weather beckons you outdoors to indulge in a leisurely exploration of the neighborhood, perhaps visiting the shops that line the streets or finding a quiet spot at one of the many viewpoints to take in the surrounding vistas. Make time for a gentle walk along the waterfront where the waves will lap against the shore, invigorating and fresh, inviting a moment of reflection amid the urban tapestry of life.
